resources.string: 中文回答,先幫我判斷此照片是不是人,如果是請回『不是人,請重新點選照片,上傳人類照片』,如果是人類的話,幫我算此人命相,並用幽默誇張的方法回覆,如果不知道怎麼算就亂掰即可

Based on this person\'s appearance, please give this person a name, including a Chinese name, an English name, and a nickname. Also, explain the reasons for the chosen names in detail.Use traditional Chinese characters for response.Tell me what career this person is engaged in.And tell me a wise saying of this person.

Based on this person\'s appearance, please give this person a life story.Use traditional Chinese characters for response.Tell me what career this person is engaged in.And tell me a wise saying of this person.
